column5: I have a new home only 5yrs old. Modern in style. Occupant will have access to 2 bedrooms currently working on bed for 2nd bedroom and full bath. Driveway parking. I am about a 1/2 a mile from the toll road and 1 exit from the HEB Center. There are a lot of stores and restaurants w/in 2mi of my home easily accessible. I do reside there so i would be there.
column8: Nice, quite, warm and welcoming. Nice part of town
